recipes.name: Asado
instructions: Season meat with coarse salt and pepper
Build a wood or charcoal fire
Grill meats slowly over medium heat
Cook for 2 hours, turning occasionally
Rest meat for 10 minutes before serving
Serve with chimichurri and red wine

recipes.name: Empanadas SalteÃ±as
instructions: Cook beef with onion and spices.
Fill dough with beef, egg, and olives.
Seal and bake until golden.

recipes.name: Milanesa a la Napolitana
instructions: Dip beef in egg and breadcrumbs, fry until golden.
Top with ham, mozzarella, and tomato sauce.
Bake until cheese melts.

recipes.name: Chimichurri
instructions: Finely chop parsley and garlic.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Let sit for 30 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Provoleta
instructions: Place cheese on grill or skillet.
Sprinkle with oregano and red pepper flakes.
Grill until melted and golden.

recipes.name: Matambre a la Pizza
instructions: Grill steak until almost cooked.
Top with tomato sauce, mozzarella, oregano, and pepper flakes.
Grill until cheese melts.

recipes.name: Locro
instructions: Cook pork and chorizo with beans and corn.
Add pumpkin, potato, and spices, simmer until thick.

recipes.name: FainÃ¡
instructions: Mix chickpea flour, water, oil, salt, and pepper.
Bake in a hot oven until set and golden.

recipes.name: Tarta Pascualina
instructions: Cook spinach and onion, mix with ricotta, parmesan, and seasonings.
Fill pie crust, make wells for eggs, cover with second crust.
Bake until golden.

recipes.name: Morcilla (Blood Sausage)
instructions: Grill morcilla sausages over medium heat until heated through and slightly crisp.

recipes.name: Ensalada Rusa
instructions: Boil potatoes and carrots until tender, dice.
Mix with peas, mayonnaise, salt, and pepper.

recipes.name: ChoripÃ¡n
instructions: Grill chorizo sausages, slice lengthwise.
Serve in rolls with chimichurri sauce.

recipes.name: Dulce de Leche Flan
instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, dulce de leche, sugar, and vanilla.
Pour into caramel-lined mold, bake in water bath until set.

recipes.name: Milanesa de Pollo
instructions: Dip chicken in egg and breadcrumbs, fry until golden.

recipes.name: Tortilla de Papas
instructions: Slice potatoes and onion, fry until soft.
Mix with eggs and salt, cook in skillet until set.

recipes.name: Arroz con Leche
instructions: Cook rice with milk, sugar, cinnamon, and lemon zest until creamy.

recipes.name: Medialunas
instructions: Mix ingredients, knead dough, let rise.
Shape into crescents, bake until golden.

recipes.name: Puchero
instructions: Simmer beef and chorizo in water.
Add vegetables and cook until tender.

recipes.name: Polenta con Tuco
instructions: Cook polenta according to package.
Brown beef with onion and garlic, add tomato sauce and seasonings.
Serve sauce over polenta.

recipes.name: Canelones de Verdura
instructions: Cook spinach, mix with ricotta, egg, and parmesan.
Fill canelones, cover with tomato sauce, bake until golden.

recipes.name: Fugazzeta
instructions: Spread dough in pan, top with mozzarella and onion.
Drizzle with oil, sprinkle with oregano and salt, bake until golden.

recipes.name: Humita en Chala
instructions: Grate corn, sautÃ© onion in butter, mix with corn, milk, sugar, salt, and paprika.
Wrap mixture in corn husks, steam until set.

recipes.name: Suprema Maryland
instructions: Bread and fry chicken, serve with fried banana, peas, and ham.

recipes.name: Revuelto Gramajo
instructions: Fry potatoes, sautÃ© onion and ham, add peas, scramble with eggs, season.

recipes.name: Pastel de Papa
instructions: Cook beef with onion and spices, layer with mashed potatoes, eggs, and olives, bake until golden.

recipes.name: Vitel TonÃ©
instructions: Boil veal, slice thin. Blend tuna, mayonnaise, capers, anchovy, lemon juice, salt, and pepper for sauce. Serve veal with sauce.

recipes.name: Milanesa de Berenjena
instructions: Slice eggplant, dip in egg and breadcrumbs, fry until golden.

recipes.name: Panqueques con Dulce de Leche
instructions: Mix flour, milk, eggs, and salt. Cook thin pancakes, fill with dulce de leche, roll up.

recipes.name: Guiso de Lentejas
instructions: Cook lentils with chorizo, bacon, and vegetables until thick and hearty.

recipes.name: Chocotorta
instructions: Mix dulce de leche and cream cheese. Dip cookies in coffee, layer with cream mixture, chill until set.

recipes.name: Ensalada Criolla
instructions: Chop vegetables, toss with oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper.

recipes.name: Pionono Salado
instructions: Spread mayonnaise on pionono, layer with ham, cheese, lettuce, and pepper. Roll up and slice.

recipes.name: Tarta de JamÃ³n y Queso
instructions: Layer ham and cheese in crust, whisk eggs with milk and seasonings, pour over, bake until set.

recipes.name: Matambre Relleno
instructions: Layer steak with vegetables and eggs, roll up, tie, simmer until tender, slice to serve.

recipes.name: Bizcochitos de Grasa
instructions: Mix ingredients, roll out, cut circles, bake until golden.

recipes.name: Helado Artesanal
instructions: Heat milk and cream, whisk yolks and sugar, combine, cook until thick, chill, churn, and freeze.

recipes.name: Tarta de Verdura
instructions: SautÃ© onion, chard, and spinach. Mix with ricotta, parmesan, eggs, and seasonings. Fill crust and bake until set.

recipes.name: Tortas Fritas
instructions: Mix ingredients, roll out, cut circles, fry until golden.

recipes.name: Empanadas de Humita
instructions: SautÃ© onion in butter, add corn, milk, sugar, salt, and paprika. Fill dough, seal, and bake until golden.

recipes.name: Lengua a la Vinagreta
instructions: Boil tongue with vegetables, peel and slice. Marinate in vinegar, oil, salt, and pepper. Serve cold.

recipes.name: BudÃ­n de Pan
instructions: Soak bread in milk, mix with sugar, eggs, vanilla, and raisins. Bake in caramel-lined pan until set.

recipes.name: MbejÃº
instructions: Mix all ingredients, cook in skillet until golden on both sides.

recipes.name: Arrollado de Pollo
instructions: Flatten chicken, layer with ham, vegetables, and eggs, roll up, wrap, and bake until set.

recipes.name: Ã‘oquis de Papa
instructions: Boil and mash potatoes, mix with flour, egg, and salt, shape into gnocchi, boil until they float.

recipes.name: Rosca de Pascua
instructions: Mix ingredients, knead dough, let rise, shape into ring, bake until golden, decorate with pastry cream.

recipes.name: Ensalada de Palmitos
instructions: Slice hearts of palm and tomatoes, toss with lettuce, mayonnaise, salt, and pepper.

recipes.name: Tarta de AtÃºn
instructions: SautÃ© onion and pepper, mix with tuna, eggs, olives, and seasonings. Fill crust and bake until set.

recipes.name: Ensalada de Remolacha y Huevo
instructions: Boil beets and eggs, slice, toss with oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper.

recipes.name: Pollo al Disco
instructions: Brown chicken, add vegetables and wine, season, simmer until tender.

recipes.name: BudÃ­n Marmolado
instructions: Mix ingredients, separate part and add cocoa, swirl together, bake until set.
